name: local-mcp-server
description: Local MCP server exposing safe developer tools for Gemini CLI

scripts.start:bg: nohup node src/server.js > server.out.log 2> server.err.log & echo $! > .mcp-server.pid
scripts.register: gemini mcp add -s project local-mcp node src/server.js --cwd ./mcp-server --description "Local project MCP server (stdio)" || true
scripts.unregister: gemini mcp remove local-mcp -s project || true
scripts.setup: npm ci && echo "Done. Next: 'npm run start:bg' to start or 'npm run register' to register with Gemini."
